name: Froggo and the Clockwork tower
description:
Froggo wish to see a great view from the top of the world, so he decided to climb the clockwork tower. But it seems like the owner of this tower has set some rules that he has to play by.

controls:

Backspace - Full screen toggle

arrow keys - Move / Direct tongue
down key - Enter door
z key - Jump
x key - Use tongue
